turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can help you order those pizzas. What did you want from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order two small pizzas. One pizza with mushrooms and green peppers, olives, and onions and extra cheese. And the other pizza, I would like just a plain pie with extra cheese and also a thin crust on both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said you want 2 small pizzas, 1 with mushrooms, green peppers, olives and onions plus extra cheese, and 1 plain pie with extra cheese, both pizzas with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $24.99 is your total, did you want me to place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order for you. The pizzas will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help you with?
